TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyDescriptorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IDictionary, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public Class PropertyDescriptorCollection Implements IDictionary, IList
public ref class PropertyDescriptorCollection : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::Collections::IList
type PropertyDescriptorCollection = class interface ICollection interface IList interface IDictionary interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是只读的;它未实现添加或删除属性的方法。 is read-only; it does not implement methods that add or remove properties. 必须继承此类，以实现这些方法。You must inherit from this class to implement these methods. 使用中可用的属性类，可以查询有关其内容的集合。Using the properties available in the class, you can query the collection about its contents. 使用 属性可确定集合中的元素数。Use the property to determine the number of elements in the collection. 使用属性按索引号或按名称获取特定属性。Use the property to get a specific property by index number or by name. 除了属性外，你可以使用方法从集合中获取具有指定名称的属性的说明。In addition to properties, you can use the method to get a description of the property with the specified name from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新上使用的属性`button1`。The following code example creates a new using the properties on `button1`. 它要求`button1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` has been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例输出中的文本框按钮上的所有属性。The next example prints all the properties on a button in a text box. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性设置的一个循环来循环访问的对象的集合的限制。You can use the property to set the limits of a loop that iterates through a collection of objects. 因为集合是从零开始，请务必使用`Count - 1`作为循环的上限。Because the collection is zero-based, be sure to use `Count - 1` as the upper boundary of the loop. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性的属性的数量输出上`button1`。The following code example uses the property to print the number of properties on `button1`. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.Count Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 索引号是从零开始。The index number is zero-based. 因此，必须减去 1 从特定的数字位置访问， 。Therefore, you must subtract 1 from the numerical position of a particular to access that . 例如，若要获取第三个，你需要指定`myColl[2]`。For example, to get the third , you need to specify `myColl[2]`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可打印的名称在文本框中的索引号指定。The following code example uses the property to print the name of the specified by the index number in a text box. 索引号是从零开始的因为此示例输出的第二个名称。Because the index number is zero-based, this example prints the name of the second . 它要求`button1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` has been instantiated on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 搜索名称时，属性是否区分大小写。The property is case-sensitive when searching for names. 即"Pname"和"pname"的名称被视为两个不同的属性。That is, the names "Pname" and "pname" are considered to be two different properties. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可打印的一种组件由索引指定。The following code example uses the property to print the type of component for the specified by the index. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. summary.span: 返回该类的枚举数。

An enumerator of type .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取一个枚举器的属性上`button1`。The following code example gets an enumerator for the properties on `button1`. 它使用枚举器输出集合中的属性的名称。It uses the enumerator to print the names of the properties in the collection. 它要求`button1`和`textBox1`已实例化窗体上。It requires that `button1` and `textBox1` have been instantiated on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PropertyDescriptorCollection.GetEnumerator Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
